column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2170271#2170272#TD4025E.TXT.r_629;TD4025E.TXT.r_630# ngo BO RGYU 'BRAS LAS LDAN 'JUG PA DANG / /

column3: gnas skabs de bzhin kun tu 'gro ba'i don // / +rtag tu mi 'gyur yon tan dbyer med ni // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2170273#2170285#TD4025E.TXT.r_629;TD4025E.TXT.r_630;TD4025E.TXT.r_631;TD4025E.TXT.r_632# ngo bo rgyu 'bras las ldan 'jug pa dang / / +gnas SKABS DE BZHIN KUN TU 'GRO BA'I DON // /

column3: don dam dbyings kyi dgongs don yin zhes bya // / +rin chen nam mkha' chu dag bzhin // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2170344#2170344#TD4025E.TXT.r_639;TD4025E.TXT.r_640# rin chen  NAM MKHA' CHU DAG BZHIN // / +rtag tu rang bzhin nyon mongs med // /

column3: rtag tu  rang bzhin nyon mongs med // / +chos mos lhag pa'i shes rab dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2170345#2170352#TD4025E.TXT.r_639;TD4025E.TXT.r_640;TD4025E.TXT.r_641;TD4025E.TXT.r_642# rin chen  nam mkha' chu dag bzhin // / +rtag TU RANG BZHIN NYON MONGS MED // /

column3: ting 'dzin snying brtse las byung ba // / +mthu dang gzhan du mi 'gyur dang / /
brlan pa'i ngo bo'i rang bzhin phyir // / +'di dag nor bu rin chen mkha' // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2170371#2170377#TD4025E.TXT.r_645;TD4025E.TXT.r_646;TD4025E.TXT.r_647# BRLAN PA'I NGO BO RANG BZHIN PHYIR // / +'di DAG NOR BU RIN CHEN MKHA' // /

column3: chu yi yon tan chos mthun nyid // / +chos la khong khro bdag  lta dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2170498#2170499#TD4025E.TXT.r_656;TD4025E.TXT.r_657# chos LA KHONG KHRO BDAG LTA DANG / / +'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs dang / /

column3: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs dang / / +sems can don la ltos med nyid // / +'dod chen mu stegs nyan thos dang / /
column4: 0.016#TD4025E.TXT.r#2170508#2170510#TD4025E.TXT.r_658;TD4025E.TXT.r_659;TD4025E.TXT.r_660# sems  CAN DON LA LTOS MED PA // / +'dod CHEN MU STEGS NYAN THOS DANG / /
column5: 0.018#TD4025E.TXT.r#2170498#2170499#TD4025E.TXT.r_656;TD4025E.TXT.r_657# chos la khong khro bdag lta dang / / +'khor BA'I SDUG BSNGAL GYIS 'JIGS DANG / /

column3: rang byung rnams kyi sgrib rnam bzhi // / +dag rgyu lhag par mos pa la // /
column4: 0.025#TD4025E.TXT.r#2170518#2170519#TD4025E.TXT.r_660;TD4025E.TXT.r_661;TD4025E.TXT.r_662# RANG BYUNG RNAMS KYI SGRIB RNAM BZHIN // / +dag RGYU LHAG PAR MOS PA LA // / +sogs pa'i chos ni rnam bzhi nyid // /

column3: sogs pa'i chos ni rnam bzhi nyid // / +theg mchog la mos sa  bon shes rab ni // /
column4: 0.028#TD4025E.TXT.r#2170918#2170918#TD4025E.TXT.r_709;TD4025E.TXT.r_710# theg    MCHOG LA MOS SA BON SHES RAB NI // / +sangs rgyas chos skyed ma dang bsam gtan gyi // /

column3: sangs rgyas chos bskyed ma dang bsam gtan gyi // / +bde ba'i mngal gnas snying rje'i ma ma can // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2170919#2170933#TD4025E.TXT.r_709;TD4025E.TXT.r_710;TD4025E.TXT.r_711;TD4025E.TXT.r_712# theg    mchog la mos sa bon shes rab ni // / +sangs RGYAS CHOS SKYED MA DANG BSAM GTAN GYI // /

column3: gang yin de dag thub pa'i rjes skyes sras // / +gtsang bdag bde dang rtag nyid kyi // /
yon tan pha rol phyin pa 'bras // / +sdug bsngal yid 'byung zhi thob par // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2170947#2170958#TD4025E.TXT.r_714;TD4025E.TXT.r_715;TD4025E.TXT.r_716;TD4025E.TXT.r_717# gtsang bdag bde  dang rtag nyid kyi // / +yon TAN PHA ROL PHYIN PA 'BRAS // /

column3: 'dun dang smon pa'i las can no // / +'di dag 'bras ni mdor bsdu na // / +chos kyi sku la phyin ci log / /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2170971#2170975#TD4025E.TXT.r_719;TD4025E.TXT.r_720;TD4025E.TXT.r_721;TD4025E.TXT.r_722# 'di DAG 'BRAS NI MDOR BSDU NA // / +chos KYI SKU LA PHYIN CI LOG / /

column3: rnam pa bzhi las bzlog pa yi // / +gnyen pos rab tu phye ba nyid // / +de ni rang bzhin dag phyir dang / / +bag chags spang phyir gtsang ba yin // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2171782#2171789#TD4025E.TXT.r_810;TD4025E.TXT.r_811;TD4025E.TXT.r_812;TD4025E.TXT.r_813# de NI RANG BZHIN DAG PHYIR DANG / / +bag CHAGS SPANGS PHYIR GTSANG BA YIN // /

column3: bdag dang bdag med spros pa dag / / +nye bar zhi  bas dam pa'i bdag / /
yid kyi rang bzhin phung po dang / / +de rgyu log phyir bde ba nyid // / +'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2171794#2171802#TD4025E.TXT.r_813;TD4025E.TXT.r_814;TD4025E.TXT.r_815;TD4025E.TXT.r_816;TD4025E.TXT.r_817# nye bar zhi bdam pa'i bdag / / +yid KYI RANG BZHIN PHUNG PO DANG / / +de RGYU LOG PHYIR BDE BA NYID // /

column3: mnyam pa nyid du rtogs phyir rtag / / +bdag sred ma lus shes rab kyis bcad de // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2172032#2172033#TD4025E.TXT.r_846;TD4025E.TXT.r_847;TD4025E.TXT.r_848# de ltar na chos gnyis po 'di ni bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi rtsa ba'i gnas su bstan pa ni / / +bdag SRED MA LUS SHES RAB KYIS BCAD DE // /

column3: sems can sred phyir brtse ldan zhi thob min // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2172034#2172044#TD4025E.TXT.r_847;TD4025E.TXT.r_848;TD4025E.TXT.r_849# bdag sred ma lus shes rab kyis bcad de // / +sems CAN SRED PHYIR BRTSE LDAN ZHI THOB MIN // /

column3: de ltar blo brtse byang chub thabs brten  nas ; / / +'phags pa 'khor ba'am mya ngan 'da' mi 'gyur // /
gal te sangs rgyas khams med na // / +sdug la skyo bar mi 'gyur zhing // /
column4: 0.009#TD4025E.TXT.r#2172071#2172079#TD4025E.TXT.r_852;TD4025E.TXT.r_853;TD4025E.TXT.r_854;TD4025E.TXT.r_856# GAL TE SANGS RGYAS KHAMS MED NA // / +sdug LA'ANG SKYO BAR MI 'GYUR ZHING // /

column3: mya ngan 'das la 'dod pa dang / / +don gnyer smon pa'ang med par 'gyur // /
srid dang mya ngan 'das la de'i // / +sdug bde'i skyon yon mthong ba 'di // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2172157#2172168#TD4025E.TXT.r_868;TD4025E.TXT.r_869;TD4025E.TXT.r_870;TD4025E.TXT.r_871;TD4025E.TXT.r_872# smon pa ni gang mngon par 'dod pa'i don la sems mngon par 'dun par byed pa'o // / +srid DANG MYA NGAN 'DAS LA DE'I // / +sdug BDE'I SKYON YON MTHONG BA 'DI // /

column3: rigs yod las yin gang phyir de // / +rigs med dag la med phyir ro // /
rgya mtsho che bzhin dpag med pa'i // / +yon tan rin chen mi zad gnas // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2172345#2172350#TD4025E.TXT.r_897;TD4025E.TXT.r_898;TD4025E.TXT.r_899# RGYA MTSHO CHE BZHIN DPAG MED PA'I // / +yon TAN RIN CHEN MI ZAD GNAS // /

column3: dbyer med yon tan dang ldan pa'i // / +ngo bo nyid phyir mar me bzhin // / +chos sku rgyal ba'i ye shes dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2172369#2172377#TD4025E.TXT.r_902;TD4025E.TXT.r_903;TD4025E.TXT.r_904;TD4025E.TXT.r_905# chos SKU RGYAL BA'I YE SHES DANG / / +thugs rje'i khams ni bsdus pa'i phyir / /

column3: thugs rje'i khams ni bsdus pa'i  phyir ; / / +snod dang rin chen chu yis ni // /
rgya mtsho dang ni mtshungs par bstan // / +dri med gnas la mngon shes dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2172500#2172511#TD4025E.TXT.r_927;TD4025E.TXT.r_928;TD4025E.TXT.r_929;TD4025E.TXT.r_930# dri MED GNAS LA MNGON SHES DANG / / +ye shes dri med de nyid dang / /

column3: ye shes dri med de nyid dang / / +rnam dbye med phyir mar me yi // /
snang dang dro mdog chos mtshungs can // / +so so'i skye 'phags rdzogs sangs kyi // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2172680#2172687#TD4025E.TXT.r_954;TD4025E.TXT.r_955;TD4025E.TXT.r_956;TD4025E.TXT.r_957# so SO'I SKYES 'PHAGS RDZOGS SANGS KYI // / +de bzhin nyid dbye'i 'jug pa las // /

column3: de bzhin nyid dbye'i  'jug pa las // / +de nyid gzigs pas sems can la // / +rgyal ba'i snying po 'di bstan to // /
so so skye bo phyin ci log / / +bden pa mthong ba bzlog pa ste // / +de bzhin gshegs pa ji lta bzhin // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2172699#2172702#TD4025E.TXT.r_959;TD4025E.TXT.r_960;TD4025E.TXT.r_961;TD4025E.TXT.r_962# SO SO'I SKYE PO PHYIN CI LOG / / +bden PA MTHONG BA BZLOG PA STE // / +de BZHIN GSHEGS PA JI LTA BZHIN // /

column3: phyin ci ma log spros med nyid // / +ma dag ma dag dag pa dang / / +shin tu rnam dag go rims  bzhin // /
column4: 1.192#TD4025E.TXT.r#2172806#2172807#TD4025E.TXT.r_979;TD4025E.TXT.r_980;TD4025E.TXT.r_981# ma DAG MA DAG DAG PA DANG / / +shin TU RNAM DAG GO RIMS BZHIN // / +sems can byang chub sems dpa' dang / /

column3: sems can byang chub sems dpa' dang / / +de bzhin gshegs pa zhes brjod do // / +ngo bo nyid la sogs pa'i don // / +'di drug gis ni bsdus pa yi // /
column4: 0.023#TD4025E.TXT.r#2172818#2172818#TD4025E.TXT.r_984;TD4025E.TXT.r_985# ngo BO NYID LA SOGS PA'I DON // / +'di DRUG GIS NI BSDUS PA YI // /

column3: khams ni gnas skabs gsum dag tu // / +ming gsum gyis ni bstan pa yin // / +ji ltar rtog med bdag nyid can // /
nam mkha'     // / +kun tu rjes song ltar // / +sems kyi rang bzhin dri med dbyings // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2172992#2173002#TD4025E.TXT.r_1010;TD4025E.TXT.r_1011;TD4025E.TXT.r_1012;TD4025E.TXT.r_1013# ji ltar rtogs med bdag nyid can // / +nam mkha' kun TU RJES SONG LTAR // /

column3: de bzhin kun tu 'gro ba nyid // / +de spyi'i mtshan nyid nyes pa dang / / +yon tan mthar thug khyab pa ste // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2173012#2173018#TD4025E.TXT.r_1015;TD4025E.TXT.r_1016;TD4025E.TXT.r_1017;TD4025E.TXT.r_1018# de'i SPYI'I MTSHAN NYID NYES PA DANG / / +yon TAN MTHAR THUG KHYAB PA STE // /
column5: 0.028#TD4025E.TXT.r#2173001#2173001#TD4025E.TXT.r_1012;TD4025E.TXT.r_1013# sems kyi rang bzhin dri med dbyings // / +de BZHIN KUN TU 'GRO BA NYID // /

column3: gzugs kyi rnam pa dman pa dang / / +bar ma mchog la nam mkha' bzhin // / +nyes pa glo bur dang ldan dang / /
yon tan rang bzhin nyid ldan phyir // / +ji ltar sngar bzhin phyis de bzhin // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2173110#2173116#TD4025E.TXT.r_1032;TD4025E.TXT.r_1033;TD4025E.TXT.r_1034# nyes pa'i glo bur dang ldan dang / / +yon TAN RANG BZHIN NYID LDAN PHYIR // /

column3: 'gyur ba med pa'i chos nyid do // / +ji ltar nam mkha' kun song ba // / +phra phyir nye bar gos pa med // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2173184#2173190#TD4025E.TXT.r_1041;TD4025E.TXT.r_1042;TD4025E.TXT.r_1043;TD4025E.TXT.r_1044# ji LTAR NAM MKHA' KUN SONGS BA // / +phra  PHYIR NYE BAR GOS PA MED // /
column5: 0.028#TD4025E.TXT.r#2173116#2173116#TD4025E.TXT.r_1033;TD4025E.TXT.r_1034# yon tan rang bzhin nyid ldan phyir // / +ji ltar sngar bzhin  phyis de bzhin // /

column3: de bzhin sems can thams cad la // / +gnas 'di nye bar gos pa  med ; / / +ji ltar 'jig rten thams cad du // /
nam mkha' la ni skye zhing 'jig / / +de bzhin 'dus ma byas dbyings la // / +dbang po rnams ni skye zhing 'jig / /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2173199#2173208#TD4025E.TXT.r_1044;TD4025E.TXT.r_1045;TD4025E.TXT.r_1046;TD4025E.TXT.r_1047;TD4025E.TXT.r_1048;TD4025E.TXT.r_1049# gnas 'di nye bar gos ba med // / +ji ltar 'jig rten thams cad du // / +nam MKHA' LA NI SKYE ZHING 'JIG / /

column3: ji ltar nam mkha' me rnams kyis // / +sngon chad nam yang tshig pa med // / +de bzhin 'di ni 'chi ba dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2173209#2173218#TD4025E.TXT.r_1048;TD4025E.TXT.r_1049;TD4025E.TXT.r_1050;TD4025E.TXT.r_1051;TD4025E.TXT.r_1052# dbang po rnams ni skye zhing 'jig / / +ji ltar nam mkha' me    rnams kyis // /

column3: na dang  rga ba'i mes mi 'tshig / / +sa ni chu la chu rlung la // / +rlung ni mkha' la rab tu gnas // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2173219#2173228#TD4025E.TXT.r_1050;TD4025E.TXT.r_1051;TD4025E.TXT.r_1052;TD4025E.TXT.r_1053;TD4025E.TXT.r_1054;TD4025E.TXT.r_1055# sngon chad nam yang tshig pa med // / +de bzhin 'di ni 'chi ba dang / / +na DANG RGA BA'I MES MI 'TSHIG / /

column3: mkha' ni rlung dang chu dag dang / / +sa yi khams la gnas ma yin // / +de bzhin phung po khams dbang rnams // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2173229#2173238#TD4025E.TXT.r_1054;TD4025E.TXT.r_1055;TD4025E.TXT.r_1056;TD4025E.TXT.r_1057;TD4025E.TXT.r_1058# rlung ni mkha' la rab tu gnas // / +mkha'i NI RLUNG DANG CHU DAG DANG / /

column3: las dang nyon mongs dag la gnas // / +las dang nyon mongs tshul bzhin min // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2173237#2173251#TD4025E.TXT.r_1056;TD4025E.TXT.r_1057;TD4025E.TXT.r_1058;TD4025E.TXT.r_1059;TD4025E.TXT.r_1060;TD4025E.TXT.r_1061# sa yi khams la gnas ma yin // / +de bzhin phung po khams  dbang rnams // / +las DANG NYON MONGS DAG LA GNAS // /

column3: yid  la byed la rtag tu gnas // / +tshul bzhin ma yin yid byed ni // / +sems kyi dag pa la rab gnas // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2173245#2173257#TD4025E.TXT.r_1058;TD4025E.TXT.r_1059;TD4025E.TXT.r_1060;TD4025E.TXT.r_1061;TD4025E.TXT.r_1062;TD4025E.TXT.r_1063# las dang nyon mongs DAG LA GNAS // / +las dang nyon mongs tshul bzhin min // /
column5: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2173299#2173303#TD4025E.TXT.r_1073;TD4025E.TXT.r_1074;TD4025E.TXT.r_1075;TD4025E.TXT.r_1072;TD4025E.TXT.r_1076# tshul BZHIN MA YIN YID BYED NI // / +sems kyi rang bzhin la gnas te // / +tshul BZHIN MA YIN YID BYED KYIS // /
column6: 0.026#TD4024E.TXT.r#443356#443356#TD4024E.TXT.r_245;TD4024E.TXT.r_246;TD4024E.TXT.r_247# tshul BZHIN MA YIN YID BYED NI // / +sems kyi rang bzhin la gnas te / / +tshul BZHIN MA YIN YID BYED KYIS // /

column3: sems kyi rang bzhin chos rnams ni // / +thams cad la yang gnas pa med // / +sa dang 'dra ba phung po dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2173258#2173265#TD4025E.TXT.r_1062;TD4025E.TXT.r_1063;TD4025E.TXT.r_1064;TD4025E.TXT.r_1065;TD4025E.TXT.r_1066# sems kyi dag pa la rab gnas // / +sems KYI RANG BZHIN CHOS RNAMS NI // /

column3: skye mched khams rnams shes par bya // / +chu khams dang 'dra lus  can gyi // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2173266#2173275#TD4025E.TXT.r_1064;TD4025E.TXT.r_1065;TD4025E.TXT.r_1066;TD4025E.TXT.r_1067;TD4025E.TXT.r_1068# thams cad la yang gnas pa  med // / +sa dang 'dra bar phung po dang / / +skye MCHED KHAMS RNAMS SHES PAR BYA // /

column3: las dang nyon mongs shes bya ste // / +tshul bzhin ma yin yid byed ni // / +rlung gi khams dang 'dra bar lta // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2173276#2173285#TD4025E.TXT.r_1067;TD4025E.TXT.r_1068;TD4025E.TXT.r_1069;TD4025E.TXT.r_1070;TD4025E.TXT.r_1071# chu khams dang 'dra lus can gyi // / +las DANG NYON MONGS SHES BYA STE // /

column3: rang bzhin nam mkha'i khams bzhin du // / +de bzhin can min gnas pa med // /
column4: 0.014#TD4025E.TXT.r#2173290#2173294#TD4025E.TXT.r_1071;TD4025E.TXT.r_1072;TD4025E.TXT.r_1073# RANG BZHIN NAM MKHA'I KHAMS BZHIN DU // / +de  BZHIN CAN MIN GNAS PA MED // /

column3: tshul bzhin ma yin yid byed ni // / +sems kyi rang bzhin la gnas te / / +tshul bzhin ma yin yid byed kyis // /
column4: 0.026#TD4024E.TXT.r#443308#443308#TD4024E.TXT.r_232;TD4024E.TXT.r_233# yid  la byed la rtag tu gnas // / +tshul BZHIN MA YIN YID BYED NI // /

column3: las dang nyon mongs rab tu phye // / +las dang nyon mongs chu las ni // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2173302#2173320#TD4025E.TXT.r_1074;TD4025E.TXT.r_1075;TD4025E.TXT.r_1076;TD4025E.TXT.r_1077;TD4025E.TXT.r_1078;TD4025E.TXT.r_1079;TD4025E.TXT.r_1080# sems kyi rang bzhin la gnas te // / +tshul bzhin ma yin yid byed kyis // / +las DANG NYON MONGS RAB TU PHYE // /

column3: phung po skye mched khams rnams 'byung // / +de 'jig pa dang chags pa ltar // / +skye dang 'jig par 'gyur ba yin // /
sems kyi rang bzhin nam mkha' yi // / +khams ltar rgyu    med rkyen med de // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2173327#2173332#TD4025E.TXT.r_1081;TD4025E.TXT.r_1082;TD4025E.TXT.r_1083# SEMS KYI RANG BZHIN NAM MKHA'I YI // / +khams LTAR RGYU MED RKYEN MED DE // /

column3: tshogs pa med cing skye ba dang / / +'jig dang gnas la'ang yod ma yin // / +sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal gang yin pa // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2173332#2173341#TD4025E.TXT.r_1082;TD4025E.TXT.r_1083;TD4025E.TXT.r_1084;TD4025E.TXT.r_1085;TD4025E.TXT.r_1086# khams ltar rgyu med rkyen med de // / +tshogs PA MED CING SKYE BA DANG / /

column3: de ni nam mkha' bzhin du 'gyur med de // / +yang dag min rtogs las byung 'dod chags sogs // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2173340#2173353#TD4025E.TXT.r_1084;TD4025E.TXT.r_1085;TD4025E.TXT.r_1086;TD4025E.TXT.r_1087;TD4025E.TXT.r_1088# 'jig dang gnas pa'ang yod ma yin // / +sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal gang yin pa // / +de ni nam mkha'  BZHIN DU 'GYUR MED DE // /

column3: glo bur dri mas de nyon mongs mi  'gyur // / +las dang nyon mongs chu sogs kyis // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2173374#2173380#TD4025E.TXT.r_1090;TD4025E.TXT.r_1091;TD4025E.TXT.r_1092;TD4025E.TXT.r_1093# las DANG NYON MONGS CHU SOGS KYIS // / +'di ni mngon par 'grub min te // /
column5: 0.026#TD4019E.TXT.r#2426897#2426897#TD4019E.TXT.r_2622;TD4019E.TXT.r_2623# glo bur nye ba'i nyon mongs kyis // / +so so'i skye bo nyon mongs 'gyur / /

column3: 'di ni mngon par 'grub min te // / +'chi dang na dang rga ba'i me // / +mi bzad pas kyang 'tshig mi 'gyur // /
dus mtha' dmyal ba tha mal pa'i // / +me gsum 'chi dang na ba dang / / +rga ba'i me gsum rim bzhin du // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2173713#2173719#TD4025E.TXT.r_1155;TD4025E.TXT.r_1156;TD4025E.TXT.r_1157;TD4025E.TXT.r_1158# bshad pas na de brjod pa // / +dus MTHA' DMYAL BA THA MAL PA'I // / +me GSUM 'CHI DANG NA BA DANG / /

column3: de dag 'dra  bar shes par bya // / +skye 'chi na dang rga ba las grol ba // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2173815#2173816#TD4025E.TXT.r_1178;TD4025E.TXT.r_1179# skye 'chi NA DANG RGA BA LAS GROL BA // / +'di yi rang bzhin ji bzhin nyid rtogs te // /

column3: 'di yi rang bzhin ji bzhin nyid rtogs te // / +skye sogs phongs dang bral yang de yi rgyus // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2173815#2173828#TD4025E.TXT.r_1178;TD4025E.TXT.r_1179;TD4025E.TXT.r_1180;TD4025E.TXT.r_1181# skye 'chi na dang rga ba las grol ba // / +'di YI RANG BZHIN JI BZHIN NYID RTOGS TE // /

column3: blo ldan 'gro la snying rje bskyed phyir bsten // / +'phags pas 'chi dang na ba dang / /
rga ba'i sdug bsngal rtsad nas spangs // / +las dang nyon mongs dbang gis skye // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2173839#2173848#TD4025E.TXT.r_1183;TD4025E.TXT.r_1184;TD4025E.TXT.r_1185;TD4025E.TXT.r_1186# 'phags pas 'chi dang na ba dang / / +rga BA'I SDUG BSNGAL RTSAD NAS SPANGS // /

column3: de la de med phyis de med // / +ji bzhin yang dag mthong ba'i phyir // / +skye sogs rnams las 'das gyur kyang // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2173891#2173901#TD4025E.TXT.r_1189;TD4025E.TXT.r_1190;TD4025E.TXT.r_1191;TD4025E.TXT.r_1192;TD4025E.TXT.r_1193# yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gang    zhig shin tu snang bar med par gyur pas cig shos gtan 'bar ba med par rtogs pa'o // / +ji BZHIN YANG DAG MTHONG BA'I PHYIR // / +skye SOGS RNAMS LAS 'DAS GYUR KYANG // /

column3: snying rje'i bdag nyid skye ba dang / / +'chi dang rga dang na bar ston // / +rgyal sras 'gyur med chos nyid 'di // /
column4: 5.960#TD4025E.TXT.r#2174783#2174785#TD4025E.TXT.r_1313;TD4025E.TXT.r_1314;TD4025E.TXT.r_1315# tshigs su bcad pa'i don gzhan ni // / +rgyal SRAS 'GYUR MED CHOS NYID 'DI // /

column3: rtogs nas ma rig  ldongs rnams kyis // / +skye ba la sogs dag tu ni // / +mthong ba gang yin de smad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2174786#2174798#TD4025E.TXT.r_1314;TD4025E.TXT.r_1315;TD4025E.TXT.r_1316;TD4025E.TXT.r_1317;TD4025E.TXT.r_1318;TD4025E.TXT.r_1319# rgyal sras 'gyur med chos nyid 'di // / +rtogs NAS MA RIG LDONGS RNAMS KYI // /

column3: 'phags pa'i spyod yul thob pa gang // / +byis pa'i spyod yul du ston te // /
de nyid phyir na 'gro ba yi // / +gnyen gyi thabs dang snying rje mchog / / +de ni 'jig rten thams cad las // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2174807#2174811#TD4025E.TXT.r_1320;TD4025E.TXT.r_1321;TD4025E.TXT.r_1322;TD4025E.TXT.r_1323# DE NYID PHYIR NI 'GRO BA YI // / +gnyen GYI THABS DANG SNYING RJE MCHOG / /

column3: 'das kyang  'jig rten las ma gyos // / +'jig rten don du 'jig rten na // / +'jig rten dri mas ma gos spyod // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2174812#2174822#TD4025E.TXT.r_1321;TD4025E.TXT.r_1322;TD4025E.TXT.r_1323;TD4025E.TXT.r_1324;TD4025E.TXT.r_1325;TD4025E.TXT.r_1326# gnyen gyi thabs dang snying rje mchog / / +de ni 'jig rten thams cad las // / +'das KYANG 'JIG RTEN LAS MA GYOS // /

column3: ji ltar padma chu nang du // / +skyes pa chu yis gos pa med // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2174823#2174830#TD4025E.TXT.r_1325;TD4025E.TXT.r_1326;TD4025E.TXT.r_1327;TD4025E.TXT.r_1328# 'jig rten dri mas ma gos spyod // / +ji LTAR PADMA CHU NANG DU // /

column3: de bzhin 'di ni 'jig rten du // / +skyes kyang 'jig rten chos mi gos // / +bya ba sgrub la rtag tu blo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2174831#2174841#TD4025E.TXT.r_1327;TD4025E.TXT.r_1328;TD4025E.TXT.r_1329;TD4025E.TXT.r_1330;TD4025E.TXT.r_1331# skyes  pa chu yis gos pa med // / +de BZHIN 'DI NI 'JIG RTEN DU // /

column3: me bzhin du  ni 'bar ba dang / / +zhi ba'i bsam gtan snyoms 'jug la // / +rtag tu snyoms par zhugs pa yin // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2174842#2174849#TD4025E.TXT.r_1330;TD4025E.TXT.r_1331;TD4025E.TXT.r_1332;TD4025E.TXT.r_1333;TD4025E.TXT.r_1334# bya ba sgrub la rtag tu blo // / +me BZHIN DU NI 'BAR BA DANG / /

column3: sngon gyi 'phen pa'i dbang dang ni // / +rnam rtog thams cad bral ba'i phyir // / +de ni lus can smin pa yi // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2174850#2174860#TD4025E.TXT.r_1332;TD4025E.TXT.r_1333;TD4025E.TXT.r_1334;TD4025E.TXT.r_1335;TD4025E.TXT.r_1336;TD4025E.TXT.r_1337# zhi ba'i bsam gtan snyoms 'jug la // / +rtag tu snyoms par zhugs pa yin // / +sngon gyi 'phen pa'i dbang    dang ni // /

column3: don du 'bad pa byed ma yin // / +bstan dang gzugs sku dag dang     // / +spyod dang spyod lam gyis kyang rung // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2174859#2174869#TD4025E.TXT.r_1335;TD4025E.TXT.r_1336;TD4025E.TXT.r_1337;TD4025E.TXT.r_1338;TD4025E.TXT.r_1339;TD4025E.TXT.r_1340# rnam rtog thams cad bral ba'i phyir // / +de ni lus can smin pa yi // / +don DU 'BAD PA BYED MA YIN // /

column3: gang zhig ji ltar gang gis 'dul // / +des de de lta nyid du shes // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2174870#2174883#TD4025E.TXT.r_1339;TD4025E.TXT.r_1340;TD4025E.TXT.r_1341;TD4025E.TXT.r_1342;TD4025E.TXT.r_1343# spyod dang spyod lam gyis kyang rung // / +gang ZHIG JI LTAR GANG GIS 'DUL // /

column3: de ltar nam mkha'i mtha' klas kyi // / +'gro la rtag tu lhun grub bar // /
thogs med blo ldan de yis ni // / +sems can don ni yang dag 'jug / / +byang chub sems dpa'i tshul 'di ni // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2174890#2174895#TD4025E.TXT.r_1343;TD4025E.TXT.r_1344;TD4025E.TXT.r_1345;TD4025E.TXT.r_1346;TD4025E.TXT.r_1347# 'gro ba rtag tu lhun grub par // / +thogs MED BLO LDAN DE YIS NI // / +sems CAN DON NI YANG DAG 'JUG / /

column3: rjes thob de bzhin gshegs rnams dang / / +sems can yang dag sgrol ba la // / +'jig rten na ni mnyam pa nyid // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2174896#2174907#TD4025E.TXT.r_1345;TD4025E.TXT.r_1346;TD4025E.TXT.r_1347;TD4025E.TXT.r_1348;TD4025E.TXT.r_1349;TD4025E.TXT.r_1350;TD4025E.TXT.r_1351# sems can don ni yang dag 'jug / / +byang chub sems dpa'i tshul 'di ni // / +rjes THOB DE BZHIN GSHEGS RNAMS DANG / /

column3: de lta mod kyi sa rdul dang / / +rgya mtsho ba glang rmig rjes kyi // / +khad par gang yin sangs rgyas dang / /
byang chub  sems dpa'i khyad de nyid // / +gzhan 'gyur min bdag mi zad chos ldan phyir // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2175080#2175084#TD4025E.TXT.r_1372;TD4025E.TXT.r_1373# gzhan 'gyur MIN BDAG MI ZAD CHOS LDAN PHYIR // /
column5: 0.028#TD4024E.TXT.r#443728#443728#TD4024E.TXT.r_342;TD4024E.TXT.r_343# mi zad yon tan dang ldan phyir // / +gzhan 'gyur min bdag rtag pa'i don // /

column3: 'gro skyabs phyi ma'i mtha' med mur thug phyir // / +de ni rtag tu gnyis med mi rtog phyir // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2175083#2175098#TD4025E.TXT.r_1372;TD4025E.TXT.r_1373;TD4025E.TXT.r_1374;TD4025E.TXT.r_1375# gzhan 'gyur min bdag mi zad chos ldan phyir // / +'gro SKYABS PHYI MA'I MTHA' MED MUR THUG PHYIR // /

column3: 'jig med chos kyang ma byas rang bzhin phyir // / +skye ba med cing 'chi ba med // /
column4: 0.012#TD4025E.TXT.r#2175108#2175109#TD4025E.TXT.r_1376;TD4025E.TXT.r_1377;TD4025E.TXT.r_1378# 'dis ci bstan zhe na / / +skye BA MED CING 'CHI BA MED // / +gnod med rga ba med pa ste // /

column3: gnod med rga ba  med pa ste // / +de ni rtag dang brtan phyir dang / / +zhi ba'i phyir dang gyung drung phyir // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2175108#2175128#TD4025E.TXT.r_1376;TD4025E.TXT.r_1377;TD4025E.TXT.r_1378;TD4025E.TXT.r_1379;TD4025E.TXT.r_1380;TD4025E.TXT.r_1381;TD4025E.TXT.r_1382;TD4025E.TXT.r_1383# 'dis ci bstan zhe na / / +skye ba med cing 'chi ba med // / +gnod MED RGA BA MED PA STE // /

column3: de ni yid kyi rang bzhin gyi // / +lus kyi skye med rtag pa'i phyir // /
bsam mi khyab 'gyur 'chi 'pho yis // / +de ni mi 'chi brtan pa'i phyir // / +bag chags phra mo'i nad rnams kyis // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2175139#2175142#TD4025E.TXT.r_1384;TD4025E.TXT.r_1385;TD4025E.TXT.r_1386# 'chi 'pho brtan  phyir de mi 'chi // / +bag CHAGS PHRA MO'I NAD RNAMS KYIS // / +gnod med zhi ba nyid kyi phyir // /

column3: gnod med  zhi ba nyid kyi phyir // / +zag med mngon par 'du byed kyis // /
gyung drung phyir na rga ba med // / +de la tshig gnyis de bzhin gnyis // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2175206#2175215#TD4025E.TXT.r_1397;TD4025E.TXT.r_1398;TD4025E.TXT.r_1399;TD4025E.TXT.r_1400;TD4025E.TXT.r_1401# de ltar don med pas ma phog pa gang yin pa de ni gyung drung nyid kyi phyir zag pa med pa'i las kyi 'bras bu yongs su smin  par rga ba yang ma yin na // / +de LA TSHIG GNYIS DE BZHIN GNYIS // /

column3: gnyis dang gnyis kyis go rims bzhin // / +'dus ma byas pa'i dbyings la ni // / +rtag pa la sogs don shes bya // /
mi zad yon tan dang ldan phyir // / +gzhan 'gyur min bdag rtag pa'i don // /
column4: 0.028#TD4024E.TXT.r#443640#443640#TD4024E.TXT.r_322# gzhan 'gyur min bdag mi zad chos ldan phyir // /

column3: mtha' yi mu dang mtshungs pa'i phyir // / +skyabs kyi bdag nyid brtan pa'i don // / +rnam par mi rtog rang bzhin phyir // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2175257#2175276#TD4025E.TXT.r_1404;TD4025E.TXT.r_1405;TD4025E.TXT.r_1406;TD4025E.TXT.r_1407;TD4025E.TXT.r_1408;TD4025E.TXT.r_1409;TD4025E.TXT.r_1410# gzhan 'gyur med bdag RTAG PA'I DON // / +mtha' yi mu dang mtshungs  pa'i phyir // /

column3: gnyis med chos nyid zhi ba'i don // / +ma bcos yon tan nyid phyir na // /
'jig med don ni gyung drung nyid // / +gang  phyir de ni chos sku de ni de bzhin gshegs // /
column4: 1.788#TD4025E.TXT.r#2175340#2175341#TD4025E.TXT.r_1417;TD4025E.TXT.r_1418# gang phyir da  NI CHOS SKU DE NI DE BZHIN GSHEGS // /

column3: de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa don dam mya ngan 'das // / +de phyir nyi dang zer bzhin yon tan dbyer med pas // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2175342#2175356#TD4025E.TXT.r_1417;TD4025E.TXT.r_1418;TD4025E.TXT.r_1419;TD4025E.TXT.r_1420# gang phyir da  ni chos sku de ni de bzhin gshegs // / +de NI 'PHAGS PA'I BDEN PA DON DAM MYA NGAN 'DAS // /

column3: sangs rgyas nyid las ma gtogs mya ngan 'das pa med // / +mdor na zag med dbyings la ni // /
don gyi rab tu dbye ba bzhis // / +chos kyi sku la sogs pa yi // / +rnam grangs bzhir ni rig par bya // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2175369#2175375#TD4025E.TXT.r_1422;TD4025E.TXT.r_1423;TD4025E.TXT.r_1424;TD4025E.TXT.r_1425;TD4025E.TXT.r_1426# mdor na     // / +zag med dbyings la ni // / +don GYI RAB TU DBYE BA BZHIS // /

column3: sangs rgyas chos dbyer med pa dang / / +de rigs de bzhin thob pa dang / / +brdzun med bslu med chos nyid dang / /
column4: 5.960#TD4025E.TXT.r#2175399#2175402#TD4025E.TXT.r_1429;TD4025E.TXT.r_1430;TD4025E.TXT.r_1431# SANGS RGYAS CHOS DBYER MED PA DANG / / +de RIGS DE BZHIN THOB PA DANG / /

column3: gdon nas rang bzhin zhi nyid do // / +rnam kun mngon rdzogs byang chub dang / /
dri ma bag chags bcas  spangs pa // / +sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das pa ni // / +dam pa'i don du gnyis med nyid // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2175582#2175587#TD4025E.TXT.r_1454;TD4025E.TXT.r_1455;TD4025E.TXT.r_1456;TD4025E.TXT.r_1457# rnam kun mngon par byang chub dang / / +dri ma bag chags  BCAS SPANGS PA // / +sangs RGYAS MYA NGAN 'DAS PA NI // /

column3: rnam pa thams cad grangs med pa // / +bsam med dri med yon tan dang / / +dbyer med mtshan nyid thar pa ste // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2175641#2175654#TD4025E.TXT.r_1459;TD4025E.TXT.r_1460;TD4025E.TXT.r_1461;TD4025E.TXT.r_1462;TD4025E.TXT.r_1463;TD4025E.TXT.r_1464# 'di dag don gcig pas  gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi tshul gyi sgo nas chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyir sangs rgyas nyid ces brjod pa gang yin pa dang  lhan cig mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pas bag chags dang bcas pa'i dri ma spangs pa'i phyir mya ngan  las 'das pa zhes brjod pa 'di gnyis ka yang zag pa med pa'i dbyings la dbyer med bcad du med de / / +gnyis su med do zhes bya bar blta bar bya'o // / +rnam PA THAMS CAD GRANGS MED PA // /

column3: thar pa gang de de bzhin gshegs // / +ji ltar ri mo 'dri byed pa // /
gzhan dang  gzhan la mkhas pa dag / / +gang zhig yan lag gang shes pa // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2175757#2175764#TD4025E.TXT.r_1478;TD4025E.TXT.r_1479;TD4025E.TXT.r_1480;TD4025E.TXT.r_1481# ji  ltar ri mo 'dri byed pa // / +gzhan DANG GZHAN LA MKHAS PA DAG / /

column3: de gzhan nges zin med par 'gyur // / +de nas 'di la khyed kun gyis // /
column4: 0.021#TD4025E.TXT.r#2175765#2175774#TD4025E.TXT.r_1480;TD4025E.TXT.r_1481;TD4025E.TXT.r_1482;TD4025E.TXT.r_1483# gang zhig yan lag gang shes pa // / +de GZHAN DES ZIN MED PAR 'GYUR // /

column3: nga yi gzugs ni gyis shig ces // / +mnga' bdag rgyal pos de dag la // / +bka' yis ras ni byin pa dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2175775#2175783#TD4025E.TXT.r_1482;TD4025E.TXT.r_1483;TD4025E.TXT.r_1484;TD4025E.TXT.r_1485;TD4025E.TXT.r_1486# des na 'di la khyed kun gyis // / +nga YI GZUGS NI GYIS SHIG CES // /

column3: de las de ni thos gyur te // / +ri mo'i las la rab sbyor ro // / +de la mngon par sbyor rnams la // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2175784#2175791#TD4025E.TXT.r_1484;TD4025E.TXT.r_1485;TD4025E.TXT.r_1486;TD4025E.TXT.r_1487;TD4025E.TXT.r_1488# mnga' bdag rgyal pos de dag la // / +bka' yis ras ni byin pa  dang / / +de LAS DE NI THOS GYUR TE // /

column3: gcig gcig yul gzhan song gyur pa // / +de ni yul gzhan song bas na // /
column4: 0.013#TD4025E.TXT.r#2175800#2175802#TD4025E.TXT.r_1489;TD4025E.TXT.r_1490;TD4025E.TXT.r_1491# GCIG CIG YUL GZHAN SONG GYUR NA // / +de NI YUL GZHAN SONG BAS NA // /

column3: de ma tshang phyir ri mo de // / +yan lag thams cad yongs rdzogs par // / +mi 'gyur bzhin shes dper byas so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2175803#2175813#TD4025E.TXT.r_1489;TD4025E.TXT.r_1490;TD4025E.TXT.r_1491;TD4025E.TXT.r_1492;TD4025E.TXT.r_1493# gcig cig yul gzhan song gyur na // / +de ni yul gzhan song bas na // / +de MA TSHANG PHYIR RI MO DE // /

column3: de rnams 'dri  byed gang yin pa // / +sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod la sogs // / +rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i // /
column4: 5.960#TD4025E.TXT.r#2175815#2175822#TD4025E.TXT.r_1493;TD4025E.TXT.r_1494;TD4025E.TXT.r_1495;TD4025E.TXT.r_1496# mi 'byung bzhin  shes dper byas so // / +de RNAMS 'DRI BYED GANG DAG yin // /

column3: stong pa nyid ni gzugs su brjod // / +shes rab ye shes rnam grol rnams // / +gsal dang 'phro dang dag phyir dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2175965#2175972#TD4025E.TXT.r_1511;TD4025E.TXT.r_1512;TD4025E.TXT.r_1513# shes RAB YE SHES RNAM GROL RNAMS // / +gsal dang 'phro  DANG DAG PHYIR DANG / /

column3: tha dad med phyir 'od dang zer // / +nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor  rnams dang mtshungs // /
des na sangs rgyas ma thob bar // / +mya ngan 'das pa mi thob ste // / +'od dang 'od zer spangs nas ni // /
column4: 0.009#TD4025E.TXT.r#2176061#2176065#TD4025E.TXT.r_1522;TD4025E.TXT.r_1523;TD4025E.TXT.r_1524;TD4025E.TXT.r_1525# DES NA SANGS RGYAS MA THOB PAR // / +mya NGAN 'DAS PA MI 'THOB STE // / +'od DANG 'OD ZER SPANGS NAS NI // /

column3: nyi ma lta bar mi nus bzhin // / +de ltar rgyal ba'i snying po ni // / +rnam gzhag rnam pa bcu zhes brjod // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2176150#2176157#TD4025E.TXT.r_1535;TD4025E.TXT.r_1536;TD4025E.TXT.r_1537;TD4025E.TXT.r_1538# de LTAR RGYAL BA'I SNYING PO NI // / +rnam GZHAG RNAM PA BCU ZHES BRJOD // /

column3: nyon mongs sbubs nang gnas pa de // / +dpe  dag gis ni shis par bya // /
sangs rgyas pa dang na sbrang rtsi sbrang ma la // / +sbun la snying po mi gtsang nang na gser // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2176216#2176220#TD4025E.TXT.r_1545;TD4025E.TXT.r_1546;TD4025E.TXT.r_1547# sangs rgyas pad NGAN SBRANG RTSI SBRANG MA LA // / +sbun pa snying po  MI GTSANG NANG NA GSER // /

column3: sa la gter dang smyug sogs 'bras chung dang / / +gos hrul nang na rgyal ba'i sku dang ni // /

column3: bud med ngan ma'i lto na mi bdag dang / / +sa la rin chen gzugs     // /

column3: yod ji lta bar // / +glo bur nyon mongs dri mas bsgribs pa yi // / +sems can rnams la de bzhin khams 'di gnas // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2176239#2176251#TD4025E.TXT.r_1549;TD4025E.TXT.r_1550;TD4025E.TXT.r_1551;TD4025E.TXT.r_1552;TD4025E.TXT.r_1553# bud med ngan ma'i lto na mi bdag dang / / +sa la rin chen gzugs YOD JI LTA BAR // /

column3: dri ma padma srog chags sbun pa mi gtsangs 'bras gos hrul dang / /
sdug bsngal 'bar bas mngon par gdungs ba'i bud med sa yi  khams dang mtshungs // / +sangs rgyas sbrang rtsi snying po gser dang gter dang nya gro rin chen sku // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2176267#2176284#TD4025E.TXT.r_1554;TD4025E.TXT.r_1555;TD4025E.TXT.r_1556# SDUG BSNGAL 'BAR BAS MNGON PAR GDUNGS PA'I BUD MED SA YI KHAMS DANG MTSHUNGS // / +sangs RGYAS SBRANG RTSI SNYING PO GSER DANG GTER DANG NYA GRO RIN CHEN SKU // /

column3: gling bdag mchog dang rin chen gzugs dang dri med khams mchog mtshungs pa nyid // /
ji ltar mdog ngan pad ma'i khong gnas pa // / +mtshan stong gis 'bar de bzhin gshegs  pa ni // /
dri med lha yi mig ldan mis mthong nas // / +chu skyes 'dab ma'i sbubs nas 'byin byed pa // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2176308#2176309#TD4025E.TXT.r_1560;TD4025E.TXT.r_1561# mtshan stong gis 'bar de bzhin gshegs pa ni // / +dri MED LHA YI MIG LDAN MIS  mthong nas // /

column3: de bzhin bde gshegs mnar med gnas rnams la'ang // / +sangs rgyas spyan gyis rang chos nyid gzigs te // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2176320#2176328#TD4025E.TXT.r_1562;TD4025E.TXT.r_1563;TD4025E.TXT.r_1564;TD4025E.TXT.r_1565# chu skyes padma'i sbubs nas 'byin byed pa // / +de BZHIN BDE GSHEGS MNAR MED RNAMS la yang // /
column5: 1.192#TD4025E.TXT.r#2176318#2176320#TD4025E.TXT.r_1562;TD4025E.TXT.r_1563# chu skyes padma'i sbubs nas 'byin byed pa // / +de BZHIN BDE GSHEGS MNAR MED RNAMS la yang // /

column3: sgrib med phyi mtha'i mur gnas thugs rje yi // /
bdag cag sgrib  pa las ni grol par mdzad // / +ji ltar mi sdug padma zum la bde bar gshegs pa ni // /
column4: 0.014#TD4025E.TXT.r#2176336#2176336#TD4025E.TXT.r_1565;TD4025E.TXT.r_1566# sgrib med phyi ma'i mur gnas thugs rje yi // / +bdag CAG SGRIB PA LAS NI GROL BAR byed // /

column3: de yi khong gnas lha mig mthong nas 'dab ma gcod byed ltar // /

column3: chags sdang sogs dri sbubs bsgribs rdzogs sangs snying po 'gro gzigs te // /

column3: thugs rjes thub pa de bzhin sgrib pa de ni  'joms par mdzad // /
ji ltar srog chags tshogs bskor sbrang rtsi ni // / +skyes bu mkhas pas de don gnyer ba yis // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2176387#2176393#TD4025E.TXT.r_1574;TD4025E.TXT.r_1575;TD4025E.TXT.r_1576# JI LTAR SROG CHAGS TSHOGS BSKOR SBRANG RTSI NI // /

column3: mthong nas thabs kyis de dang srog chags tshogs // / +kun nas bral bar rab tu byed pa bzhin // /
column4: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2329996#2329996#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2264# bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon gnas der lan    grangs bye ba phrag drug cu'i bar du sbyin pa rgya cher btang ba'i phyir dang  sangs rgyas bye ba phrag drug cu snyed la der mchod cing bsnyen bkur mdzad pa'i phyir dang  gzhan yang gnas der sangs rgyas bye ba phrag drug cus sngon chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir dang  gzhan yang gnas de na rtag  par drang srong rab tu zhib mang po gnas par gyur pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do / /

column3: drang srong chen pos kun mkhyen spyan gyis ni // / +rig  khams sbrang rtsi dang 'dra de gzigs nas // /
column4: 0.018#TD4025E.TXT.r#2176408#2176415#TD4025E.TXT.r_1578;TD4025E.TXT.r_1579;TD4025E.TXT.r_1580# DRANG SRANG CHEN POS KUN MKHYEN SPYAN GYIS NI // / +rigs KHAMS SBRANG RTSI DANG 'DRA 'DI GZIGS NAS // /

column3: de yi sgrib pa sbrang ma dang 'dra ba // / +gtan nas rab tu spong bar mdzad pa yin // /

column3: ji ltar sbrang rtsi srog chags bye ba khrag khrig stong bsgribs sbrang rtsi don gnyer mis // /

column3: sbrang ma de dag bsal te ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbrang rtsi'i bya byed pa // /

column3: de bzhin lus can la yod zag pa med pa'i shes pa sbrang ma'i rtsi dang 'dra // /

column3: nyon mongs sbrang ma dang 'dra de 'joms pa la mkhas pa'i rgyal ba skyes bu bzhin // /
ji ltar spun ldan 'bru yi snying po ni // / +mi rnams kyis ni spyad byar mi 'gyur ba // /
zas sogs don du gnyer ba gang yin    pa ; / / +de dag gis ni sbun nas de 'byin ltar // /
column4: 0.018#TD4025E.TXT.r#2176488#2176488#TD4025E.TXT.r_1591;TD4025E.TXT.r_1592# de DAG GIS NI SBUN GNAS DE 'BYIN LTAR // / +de bzhin sems can la yod nyon mongs kyi // /

column3: de bzhin sems can la yod nyon mongs kyi // / +dri ma dang 'dres rgyal ba'ang ji srid du // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2176489#2176505#TD4025E.TXT.r_1591;TD4025E.TXT.r_1592;TD4025E.TXT.r_1593;TD4025E.TXT.r_1594;TD4025E.TXT.r_1595# de dag gis ni sbun gnas de 'byin ltar // / +de BZHIN SEMS CAN LA YOD NYON MONGS KYI // /

column3: nyon mongs dri ma 'dres las ma grol ba // / +de srid rgyal mdzad srid gsum 'du mi byed // /
ji ltar s'a lu bra bo nas 'bru'i snying po sbun las  ma byung gra ma can // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2176512#2176517#TD4025E.TXT.r_1595;TD4025E.TXT.r_1596# de srid rgyal mdzad srid gsum du mi byed // / +ji LTAR S'A LU BRA 'O NA SA 'BRU'I SNYING PO SBUN LAS MA BYUNG GRA MA CAN // /

column3: legs par ma bsgrubs mi rnams kyis ni spyad bya bza' ba zhim por mi 'gyur ltar // /

column3: de bzhin sems can la yod chos kyi dbang phyug nyon mongs sbubs las ma grol lus // /
column4: 0.025#TD4025E.TXT.r#2176538#2176538#TD4025E.TXT.r_1598# DE BZHIN SEMS CAN LA YOD CHOS KYI DBANG PHYAG  NYON MONGS SBUN LAS MA GROL LUS // /

column3: nyon mongs bkres pas nyen pa'i 'gro la chos kyi dga' ba'i ro ster 'gyur ba yin // /
ji ltar rab tu rgyu tshe mi yi gser // / +ljan ljin rul ba'i gnas su lhung gyur pa // /
mi 'jig chos can de ni der de bzhin // / +lo brgya mang po dag tu gnas pa de // / +lha mig rnam dag dang ldan lha yis der // /

column3: mthong nas mi la 'di na yod pa'i gser // / +rin chen mchog 'di  sbyangs te rin chen gyis // /

column3: nyon mongs su bying sems can yon tan ni // / +gzigs nas nyon mongs 'dam de dag bya'i phyir // /

column3: kun tu dag par bya phyir mchog tu mdzes pa mi la nan gyis ston pa ltar // /

column5: 0.024#TD4024E.TXT.r#444321#444321#TD4024E.TXT.r_458;TD4024E.TXT.r_459# bsgrub par bya ba gyis zhes smra ba ltar // / +de bzhin thub pas mi gtsang dang 'dra ba'i // /

column3: sems can rnams la gzigs nas de dag bya phyir / / +lus  can rnams la chos ston to // /

column3: de bzhin yid kyi nang chud rin chen gter // / +dri med gzhag dang bsal med chos  nyid kyang // /

column3: ji ltar dbul po'i khyim nang du ni rin chen gter chud gyur pa'i mi la ni // /

column3: rin chen gter bdag yod ces rjod par mi byed de ni mi yis shes min ltar // /

column3: de bzhin chos     // / +gter yid kyi khyim gnas sems can rnams ni dbul po lta bu ste // /

column3: de dag rnams kyis de thob bya phyir 'jig rten du ni drang srong yang dag bstams  // /

column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2176763#2176771#TD4025E.TXT.r_1633;TD4025E.TXT.r_1634;TD4025E.TXT.r_1635;TD4025E.TXT.r_1636# de bzhin gshegs pa'i khams ni sa bon gyi mya gu lta bu ste / / +ji LTAR AA MRA LA SOGS  shing 'bras la // /

column3: sa rmos chu  sogs ldan pa'i ljon shing gi / / +rgyal po'i dngos po rim gyis 'grub pa ltar // /

column3: de bzhin dge ba de de la brten nas // / +rim gyis thub pa'i rgyal po'i dngos por 'gyur // /

column3: chu dang nyi ma'i 'od dang rlung dang sa dus nam mkha'i rkyen rnams kyis // / +ta la dang ni aa mra'i 'bras sbubs gseb nas shing skye ji ltar bar // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2176803#2176821#TD4025E.TXT.r_1641;TD4025E.TXT.r_1642;TD4025E.TXT.r_1643;TD4025E.TXT.r_1644# rim gyis thub pa'i rgyal po'i dngos por 'gyur // / +chu DANG NYI MA'I 'OD DANG RLUNG DANG SA DUS NAM MKHA'I RKYEN RNAMS KYIS // /

column3: sems can nyon mongs 'bras lpags nang chud rjod / /
sangs sa bon myu gu yang // / +de bzhin dge rkyen de dan de las chos mthong 'phel  bar 'gyur ba yin // /
ji lar rin chen las byas rgyal ba'i gzugs // / +gos hrul dri ngan gyis ni gtums gyur pa // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2176851#2176859#TD4025E.TXT.r_1649;TD4025E.TXT.r_1650;TD4025E.TXT.r_1651# JI LTAR RIN CHEN LAS BYAS RGYAL BA'I GZUGS // /

column3: thogs med spyan mnga' rnam pa sna tshogs kyi // / +nyon mongs kyis  gtums bde gshegs dngos po nyid // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2176880#2176885#TD4025E.TXT.r_1653;TD4025E.TXT.r_1654;TD4025E.TXT.r_1655;TD4025E.TXT.r_1656# de bzhin thogs MED RNAM PA SNA TSHOGS KYI // / +nyon MONGS KYIS GTUMS BDE GSHEGS DNGOS PO NYID // /

column3: dud 'gro la yang gzigs nas de bzhin de // / +thar par bya ba'i don du thams ston mdzod // /

lam gnas lha yi mig gis mthong nas thar phyir mi la ston ba ltar // /
de bzhin nyon  mongs gos hrul gyis gtums 'khor ba'i lam na gnas pa'i khams // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2176912#2176925#TD4025E.TXT.r_1658;TD4025E.TXT.r_1659;TD4025E.TXT.r_1660# lam gnas lha yi mig gis mthong nas mthar phyin mi la ston pa ltar // / +de BZHIN NYON MONGS GOS HRUL GYIS GTUMS 'KHOR BA'I LAM NA GNAS PA'I KHAMS // /

column3: dud 'gro la yang gzigs nas thar par bya phyir rgyal ba chos ston to // /
ji ltar mi mo gzugs ngan mgon med 'ga' // / +mgon med 'dug gnas su ni 'dug gyur la // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2176944#2176951#TD4025E.TXT.r_1663;TD4025E.TXT.r_1664;TD4025E.TXT.r_1665# JI LTAR MI MO GZUGS NGAN MGON  med 'ga' // /

column3: mngal gyis rgyal po'i dpal  ni 'dzin byed pas // / +rang lto na yod mi bdag mi shes ltar // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2176952#2176963#TD4025E.TXT.r_1664;TD4025E.TXT.r_1665;TD4025E.TXT.r_1666;TD4025E.TXT.r_1667# mgon med 'dug gnas su ni 'dug gyur la // / +mngal GYI RGYAL PO'I DPAL NI 'DZIN BYED PAS // /

column3: srid par skye ba mgon med khyim bzhin te // / +ma dag sems can mngal ldan bud med bzhin // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2176964#2176974#TD4025E.TXT.r_1666;TD4025E.TXT.r_1667;TD4025E.TXT.r_1668;TD4025E.TXT.r_1669# rang lto na yod mi bdag mi shes ltar // / +srid PAR SKYE BA MGON MED KHYIM BZHIN TE // /

column3: de la gang zhig yod pas mgon bcas pa // / +dri med khams ni de yi mngal gnas bzhin // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2176983#2176994#TD4025E.TXT.r_1669;TD4025E.TXT.r_1670;TD4025E.TXT.r_1671# DE LA GANG ZHIG YOD  PAS MGON BCAS PA // / +dri MED KHAMS NI DE YI MNGAL GNAS BZHIN // /
column5: 0.027#TD4025E.TXT.r#2176973#2176973#TD4025E.TXT.r_1667;TD4025E.TXT.r_1668# srid par skye ba mgon med khyim bzhin te // / +ma dag sems can mngal ldan bud med bzhin // /

column3: ji ltar bud med    lus la dri bcas gos gyon mi sdug gzugs ldan pa // /
sa bdag mngal na gnas kyang mgon med khang par sdug bsngal mchog myong ltar // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2176999#2177007#TD4025E.TXT.r_1671;TD4025E.TXT.r_1672;TD4025E.TXT.r_1673# ji ltar bud med lus la dri bcas gos gon mi sdug gzugs ldan pa // / +sa BDAG MNGAL NA GNAS KYANG MGON MED KHANG PAR SDUG BSNGAL MCHOG MYONG LTAR // /

column3: de bzhin bdag rang nang gnas mgon yod gyur kyang mgon med blo ldan pa // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2177008#2177023#TD4025E.TXT.r_1672;TD4025E.TXT.r_1673;TD4025E.TXT.r_1674# sa bdag mngal na gnas kyang mgon med khang par sdug bsngal mchog myong ltar // / +de BZHIN BDAG RANG NANG GNAS MGON YOD GYUR KYANG  MGON MED BLO LDAN PA // /

column3: 'gro ba nyon mongs dbang gis yid ma zhi bas sdug  bsngal gzhi la gnas // /
ji ltar nang gi gser zhun gzugs rgyas pa // / +zhib phyi rol sa yi rang bzhin can // /
mthong nas de shes pa dag nang gi gser // / +sbyang phyir phyi rol sgrib pa sel byed ltar // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2177051#2177059#TD4025E.TXT.r_1678;TD4025E.TXT.r_1679;TD4025E.TXT.r_1680;TD4025E.TXT.r_1681# zhi ba phyi rol sa    yi rang bzhin can // / +mthong NAS DE SHES PA DAG NANG GI GSER // /

column3: rang bzhin 'od gsal dri med rnams kyang ni // / +glo bur bar ni rnam par  gzigs gyur nas // /
column4: 0.025#TD4025E.TXT.r#2177067#2177075#TD4025E.TXT.r_1682;TD4025E.TXT.r_1683;TD4025E.TXT.r_1684# glo BUR BAR NI RNAM PAR GZIGS GYUR NAS // / +rin chen 'byung gnas lta bu'i 'gro ba rnams // /

column3: rin chen 'gyur gnas lta bu'i 'gro ba rnams // / +sgrib pa dag las sbyong mdzad byang chub mchog / /
ji ltar dri med gser 'bar las byas sa yi nang du chud gyur gzugs // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2177080#2177090#TD4025E.TXT.r_1684;TD4025E.TXT.r_1685;TD4025E.TXT.r_1686# sgrib pa dag las sbyong mdzad byang chub  mchog / / +ji LTAR DRI MED GSER 'BAR LAS BYAS SA YI NANG DU CHUD GYUR GZUGS // /

column3: zhi de rang bzhin mkhas pas rig nas sa dag sel bar byed par ltar // / +de  bzhin kun mkhyen dag pa'i gser 'dra zhi ba'i yid ni mkhyen gyur nas // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2177099#2177112#TD4025E.TXT.r_1686;TD4025E.TXT.r_1687;TD4025E.TXT.r_1688# ZHI DE RANG BZHIN MKHAS PAS RIG NAS SA DAG SEL BAR BYED PA LTAR // / +de BZHIN KUN MKHYEN DAG PA'I GSER 'DRA ZHI BA'I YID NI MKHYEN GYUR NAS // /

column3: chos 'chad tshul gyis brdeg spyad sgrub pas sgrib pa dag ni sel bar mdzad // /
padma srog chags bung ba dang / / +sbun pa dang ni mi gtsang sa // / +'bras shun gos hrul bud med kyi // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2177121#2177129#TD4025E.TXT.r_1689;TD4025E.TXT.r_1690;TD4025E.TXT.r_1691;TD4025E.TXT.r_1692# dpe rnams kyis bsdus pa'i don ni / / +padma SROG CHAGS BUNG BA DANG  sbun PA DANG NI MI GTSANG SA // /

column3: mngal dang sa yi sbubs  na yang // / +sangs rgyas sbrang rtsi snying po bzhin // / +gser bzhin gter bzhin ljon pa bzhin // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2177128#2177142#TD4025E.TXT.r_1691;TD4025E.TXT.r_1692;TD4025E.TXT.r_1693;TD4025E.TXT.r_1694;TD4025E.TXT.r_1695# 'bras shun gos hrul bud med kyi // / +mngal DANG SA YI SBUBS NA YANG // /

column3: rin chen sku dang 'khor lo yis // / +bsgyur ba bzhin dang gser gzugs bzhin // /
column4: 1.192#TD4025E.TXT.r#2177141#2177150#TD4025E.TXT.r_1694;TD4025E.TXT.r_1695;TD4025E.TXT.r_1696;TD4025E.TXT.r_1697# gser bzhin gter bzhin ljon pa bzhin // / +rin  CHEN SKU DANG 'KHOR LO YIS // /

column3: sems can khams kyi nyon mongs sbubs // / +ma 'brel thog ma med pa na // / +sems kyi rang bzhin dri med ni // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2177151#2177161#TD4025E.TXT.r_1696;TD4025E.TXT.r_1697;TD4025E.TXT.r_1698;TD4025E.TXT.r_1699;TD4025E.TXT.r_1700# sgyur ba bzhin dang gser gzugs bzhin // / +sems CAN KHAMS KYI NYON MONGS SBUBS // /

column3: thog ma med pa yin par brjod // / +chags dang sdang dang rmongs dang de'i // / +kun ldang drag dang bag chags dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2177220#2177225#TD4025E.TXT.r_1707;TD4025E.TXT.r_1708;TD4025E.TXT.r_1709# chags dang  SDANG DANG RMONGS DANG DE'I // / +kun LDANG DRAG DANG BAG CHAGS DANG / /

column3: mthong sgom lam spang ma dag dang / / +dag pa'i sa la brten pa yi // / +dri ma rnam dgu padma yi // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2177224#2177234#TD4025E.TXT.r_1708;TD4025E.TXT.r_1709;TD4025E.TXT.r_1710;TD4025E.TXT.r_1711;TD4025E.TXT.r_1712# kun ldang drag dang bag chags dang / / +mthong SGOM LAM SPANGS MA DAG DANG / /

column3: sbubs sogs  dpe ni rab bstan te // / +nye ba'i nyon mongs sbubs kyi ni // /
column4: 0.018#TD4025E.TXT.r#2177235#2177243#TD4025E.TXT.r_1711;TD4025E.TXT.r_1712;TD4025E.TXT.r_1713;TD4025E.TXT.r_1714# dri ma rnam dgu padma yi // / +sbubs SOGS DPES NI RAB BSTAN TE // /

column3: dbye ba bye ba mtha' las 'das // / +chags sogs dri ma dgu po 'di // /
mdor bsdus nas ni go rims bzhin // / +padma'i sbubs la sogs pa yi // / +dpe dgu dag gis yang dag bstan // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2177484#2177488#TD4025E.TXT.r_1730;TD4025E.TXT.r_1731;TD4025E.TXT.r_1732;TD4025E.TXT.r_1733# chags sogs nyon mongs dgu po 'di // / +mdor BSDUS NAS NI GO RIMS BZHIN // /

column3: dri 'di dag gis byi     // / +dgra bcom slob pa blo ldan rnams // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2177520#2177523#TD4025E.TXT.r_1737;TD4025E.TXT.r_1738# dgra BCOM SLOB DANG BLO LDAN RNAMS // / +rim bzhin bzhi dang gcig dang ni // /

column3: rim bzhin bzhi dang gcig dang ni // / +gnyis dang gnyis kyis mdag nyid // / +ji ltar padma 'dam skyes de // /
mdun du gyur na yid dga' dang / / +phyis nas dga' ba med 'gyur pa // /
column4: 0.020#TD4025E.TXT.r#2177582#2177582#TD4025E.TXT.r_1748;TD4025E.TXT.r_1749# ji ltar padma 'dam skyes de // / +mdun DU GYUR NA YID DGA' DANG / /

column3: 'dod  chags dga' ba de bzhin no // / +ji ltar srog chags sbrang ma ni // / +shin tu 'khrugs te mdung brdeg ltar // /
column4: 0.016#TD4025E.TXT.r#2177594#2177596#TD4025E.TXT.r_1751;TD4025E.TXT.r_1752;TD4025E.TXT.r_1753# 'dod CHAGS DGA' BA DE BZHIN NO // / +ji LTAR SROG CHAGS SBRANG MA NI // / +shin tu 'khrug te mdung  brdeg ltar // /

column3: de bzhin zhe sdang skye bas na // / +snying la sdug bsngal skyed par byed // / +ji lta 'bras sogs snying po ni // /
column4: 0.018#TD4025E.TXT.r#2177605#2177607#TD4025E.TXT.r_1754;TD4025E.TXT.r_1755;TD4025E.TXT.r_1756# DE BZHIR ZHE SDANG SKYE BAS NA // / +snying LA SDUG BSNGAL SKYED PAR BYED // /

column3: phyi rol sbun pas bsgribs pa ltar // / +de bzhin snying po'i  don mthong ba // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2177617#2177620#TD4025E.TXT.r_1757;TD4025E.TXT.r_1758;TD4025E.TXT.r_1759# PHYIR ROL SBUN PAS BSGRIBS PA LTAR // / +de BZHIN SNYING PO'I DON MTHONG BA // /

column3: ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs kyis bsgribs // / +ji ltar mi gtsang mi mthun pa // / +de bzhin chags dang bcas rnams kyi // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2177621#2177630#TD4025E.TXT.r_1758;TD4025E.TXT.r_1759;TD4025E.TXT.r_1760;TD4025E.TXT.r_1761;TD4025E.TXT.r_1762# de bzhin snying po'i don mthong ba // / +ma RIG SGO NGA'I SBUBS KYIS BSGRIBS // /

column3: 'dod pa bsten pa'i rgyu yin phyir // / +kun nas ldang ba mi gtsang 'dra // / +ji ltar nor ni bsgribs pas na // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2177631#2177640#TD4025E.TXT.r_1760;TD4025E.TXT.r_1761;TD4025E.TXT.r_1762;TD4025E.TXT.r_1763;TD4025E.TXT.r_1764;TD4025E.TXT.r_1765# ji ltar mi gtsang mi mthun pa // / +de bzhin  chags dang bcas rnams kyi // / +'dod PA BSTEN PA'I RGYU YIN PHYIR // /

column3: mi shes gter mi thob pa  ltar // / +de bzhin skye la rang byung nyid // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2177641#2177649#TD4025E.TXT.r_1763;TD4025E.TXT.r_1764;TD4025E.TXT.r_1765;TD4025E.TXT.r_1766;TD4025E.TXT.r_1767# kun nas ldang ba mi gtsang 'dra // / +ji ltar nor ni bsgribs pas na // / +mi SHES GTER MI THOB PA LTAR // /

column3: ma rig bag chags sa yis bsgribs // / +ji ltar myug sogs rim skye bas // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2177648#2177664#TD4025E.TXT.r_1765;TD4025E.TXT.r_1766;TD4025E.TXT.r_1767;TD4025E.TXT.r_1768;TD4025E.TXT.r_1769;TD4025E.TXT.r_1770;TD4025E.TXT.r_1771# mi shes gter mi thob pa ltar // / +de bzhin skye la rang byung nyid // / +ma RIG BAG CHAGS SA YIS BSGRIBS // /

column3: sa bon shun pa gcod pa ltar // / +de bzhin de nyid mthong ba yis // / +mthong spang rnams ni bzlog par 'gyur // /
'phags pa'i lam dang 'brel  pa las // / +'jig tshogs snying po bcom rnams kyis // / +bsgom lam ye shes spang bya rnams // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2177669#2177677#TD4025E.TXT.r_1771;TD4025E.TXT.r_1772;TD4025E.TXT.r_1773;TD4025E.TXT.r_1774;TD4025E.TXT.r_1775# mthong spangs rnams ni ldog par 'gyur // / +'phags PA'I LAM DANG 'BREL PA LAS / / +'jig TSHOGS SNYING PO BCOM RNAMS KYI // /

column3: gos hrul dag dang mtshungs par bstan // / +sa bdun la brten dri ma ni // / +mngal sbubs dri ma dag dang mtshungs // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2177678#2177696#TD4025E.TXT.r_1774;TD4025E.TXT.r_1775;TD4025E.TXT.r_1776;TD4025E.TXT.r_1777;TD4025E.TXT.r_1778;TD4025E.TXT.r_1779;TD4025E.TXT.r_1780# bsgom lam ye shes spang bya rnams // / +gos HRUL DAG DANG MTSHUNGS PAR BSTAN / /

column3: mngal sbubs bral 'dra mi rtog pa'i // / +ye shes  rnam par smin pa bzhin // /
sa gsum rjes 'brel dri ma rnams // / +sa 'dam gos bzhin shes bya ste // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2177697#2177706#TD4025E.TXT.r_1778;TD4025E.TXT.r_1779;TD4025E.TXT.r_1780;TD4025E.TXT.r_1781;TD4025E.TXT.r_1782# mngal la sbubs bral 'dra mi rtog pa'i // / +ye shes rnam par smin pa bzhin // / +sa GSUM RJES 'BREL DRI MA RNAMS // /

column3: bdag nyid chen po rdo rje lta'i // / +ting nge 'dzin gyis gzhom bya yin // /
de ltar chags sogs dri ma dgu // / +padma la sogs dag dang mtshungs // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2177715#2177727#TD4025E.TXT.r_1783;TD4025E.TXT.r_1784;TD4025E.TXT.r_1785;TD4025E.TXT.r_1786# ting nge  'dzin gyis gzhom bya yin // / +de LTAR CHAGS SOGS DRI MA DGU // /

column3: rang bzhin  gsum gyis bsdus phyir khams // / +sangs rgyas sogs dang chos mtshungs so // /
'di yi rang bzhin chos sku dang / / +de bzhin nyid dang rigs kyang ste // / +de ni dpe gsum gcig dang ni // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2177759#2177764#TD4025E.TXT.r_1791;TD4025E.TXT.r_1792;TD4025E.TXT.r_1793;TD4025E.TXT.r_1794# 'di YI RANG BZHIN CHOS SKU DANG / / +de BZHIN NYID DANG RIGS KYANG STE // /

column3: lnga rnams kyis ni shes par bya // / +chos sku rnam gnyis shes bya ste // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2177815#2177819#TD4025E.TXT.r_1799;TD4025E.TXT.r_1800# chos SKU RNAM GNYIS SHES BYA STE // / +chos dbyings shin tu dri med dang / /

column3: chos    dbyings shin tu dri med dang / / +de yi rgyu mthun zab pa dang / /
sna tshogs tshul ni ston pa'o // / +'jig rten 'das phyir 'jig rten na // / +'di la dpe ni mi dmigs pas // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2177904#2177904#TD4025E.TXT.r_1814;TD4025E.TXT.r_1815# mdo dang  dbyangs  kyis bsnyad pa dang  lung bstan pa dang  tshigs su bcad pa dang  ched du brjod pa dang  gleng gzhi la sogs pa rnam pa du mar sna tshogs pa'i chos rnam par 'jog pa'i tshul bstan pa'o // / +'jig RTEN 'DAS PHYIR 'JIG RTEN NA // /

column3: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang khams // / +'dra ba nyid du bstan pa yin // / +phra mo zab mo'i tshul  bstan ni // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2177914#2177919#TD4025E.TXT.r_1817;TD4025E.TXT.r_1818;TD4025E.TXT.r_1819;TD4025E.TXT.r_1820# DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA NYID DANG KHAMS // / +'dra BA NYID DU BSTAN PA YIN // / +phra MO ZAB MO'I TSHUL BSTAN NI // /

column3: sbrang rtsi ro gcig pa bzhin te // / +rnam pa sna tshogs tshul bstan ni // / +sna tshogs sbubs snying bzhin shes bya // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2177918#2177928#TD4025E.TXT.r_1818;TD4025E.TXT.r_1819;TD4025E.TXT.r_1820;TD4025E.TXT.r_1821;TD4025E.TXT.r_1822# 'dra ba nyid du bstan pa yin // / +phra mo zab mo'i TSHUL BSTAN NI // / +sbrang RTSI RO GCIG PA BZHIN TE // /

column3: rang bzhin 'gyur ba med pa dang / / +dge dang rnam par dag pa'i phyir // / +de bzhin nyid 'di gser gyi ni // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2178001#2178006#TD4025E.TXT.r_1835;TD4025E.TXT.r_1836;TD4025E.TXT.r_1837;TD4025E.TXT.r_1838# RANG BZHIN 'GYUR BA MED PA DANG / / +dge DANG RNAM PAR DAG PA'I PHYIR // / +de BZHIN NYID 'DI GSER GYI NI // /

column3: gzugs dang mtshungs par  brjod pa yin // / +gter dang 'bras bu'i shing bzhin du // / +rigs de rnam gnyis shes bya ste // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2178124#2178129#TD4025E.TXT.r_1854;TD4025E.TXT.r_1855;TD4025E.TXT.r_1856;TD4025E.TXT.r_1857# zhes gsungs so // / +gter DANG 'BRAS BU'I SHING BZHIN DU // / +rigs DE RNAM GNYIS SHES BYA STE // /

column3: thog med rang bzhin gnas pa dang / / +yang dag blang ba mchog nyid do // / +rigs 'di gnyis las sangs rgyas kyi // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2178128#2178139#TD4025E.TXT.r_1855;TD4025E.TXT.r_1856;TD4025E.TXT.r_1857;TD4025E.TXT.r_1858;TD4025E.TXT.r_1859;TD4025E.TXT.r_1860# gter dang 'bras bu'i shing bzhin du // / +rigs de rnam gnyis shes bya ste // / +thog MED RANG BZHIN GNAS PA DANG / /

column3: sku gsum thob par 'dod pa yin // / +dang po'i sku ni  dang po ste // / +gnyis pa yis ni phyi ma gnyis // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2178140#2178149#TD4025E.TXT.r_1859;TD4025E.TXT.r_1860;TD4025E.TXT.r_1861;TD4025E.TXT.r_1862;TD4025E.TXT.r_1863# rigs 'di gnyis las sangs rgyas kyi // / +sku GSUM THOB PAR 'DOD PA YIN // /

column3: ngo bo nyid sku mdzes pa ni // / +rin chen sku 'drar shes bya ste // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2178150#2178157#TD4025E.TXT.r_1861;TD4025E.TXT.r_1862;TD4025E.TXT.r_1863;TD4025E.TXT.r_1864;TD4025E.TXT.r_1865# dang bos sku ni dang po  ste ; / / +gnyes pa yis ni phyi ma gnyis // / +ngo BO NYID SKU MDZES PA NI // /

column3: rang bzhin gyis ni byas min dang / / +yon tan rin chen gter yin phyir // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2178158#2178166#TD4025E.TXT.r_1864;TD4025E.TXT.r_1865;TD4025E.TXT.r_1866;TD4025E.TXT.r_1867# rin chen sku 'drar shes bya ste // / +rang BZHIN GYIS NI BYIS MIN DANG / /

column3: chos chen rgyal srid che ldan phyir // / +rdzogs longs 'khor los sgyur bzhin no / /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2178165#2178183#TD4025E.TXT.r_1866;TD4025E.TXT.r_1867;TD4025E.TXT.r_1868;TD4025E.TXT.r_1869;TD4025E.TXT.r_1870# yon tan rin chen gter yin phyir // / +chos CHEN RGYAL SRID CHE LDAN PHYIR // /

column3: gzugs brnyan gyi ni rang bzhin phyir // / +sprul pa gser gyi gzugs lta bu // /
rang byung rnams kyi don dam de // / +dad pa nyid kyis rtogs bya yin // / +nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dod 'bar ba // /
mig med pas ni mthong ba med // / +'di la bsal bya ci yang med // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2178916#2178923#TD4025E.TXT.r_1970;TD4025E.TXT.r_1971;TD4025E.TXT.r_1972;TD4025E.TXT.r_1973# 'di LA BSAL BYA CI YANG MED // / +gzhag par bya ba cung zad med // /
column5: 0.019#TD4077E.TXT.r#889326#889329#TD4077E.TXT.r_66;TD4077E.TXT.r_67;TD4077E.TXT.r_68# zhes bya bas ni de nyid sgrub par byed de / / +'di LA BSAL BYA CI YANG MED // /

column3: gzhag par bya ba  cung zad med // / +yang dag nyid la yang dag lta // / +yang dag mthong na rnam par grol // /
rnam dbye bcas pa'i mtshan nyid can // / +glo bur dag gis khams stong gi / /
rnam dbye med pa'i mtshan nyid can // / +bla med chos kyis stong ma yin // /
sprin dang rmi lam sgyu bzhin  de dang der // / +shes bya thams cad rnam kun stong pa zhes // /

column3: dbang  po drug don nyams su myong ba'i rgyu // / +'byung med gzugs don blta dang gtam bzang ni // /

column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2180128#2180134#TD4025E.TXT.r_2191;TD4025E.TXT.r_2192;TD4025E.TXT.r_2193# GTSANG MA NYAN DANG BDE GSHEGS  TSHUL KHRIMS KYI // / +dri GTSANG SNOM DANG 'PHAGS CHEN DAM CHOS RO // /

column3: myang dang ting 'dzin reg bde nyams myong dang / / +rang gi ngo bo nyid kyi zab pa'i tshul // /

column3: rtogs pa'i rgyur gyur zhib mor bsams pa na // / +don dam bde mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa ni // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2180153#2180157#TD4025E.TXT.r_2195;TD4025E.TXT.r_2196;TD4025E.TXT.r_2197# RTOGS PA'I RGYUR GYUR ZHI BA MOR BSAMS PA NA // / +don DAM BDE MDZAD DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA NI // /

column3: nam mkha' bzhin du rgyu mtshan rnams dang bral // / +mdor na ye shes gnyis po yi // /
las su 'di ni shes bya ste // / +grol ba'i sku ni rdzogs pa dang / / +chos kyi sku ni sbyong ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2180176#2180181#TD4025E.TXT.r_2201;TD4025E.TXT.r_2202;TD4025E.TXT.r_2203;TD4025E.TXT.r_2204# LAS SU 'DI NI SHES BYA STE // / +'gro BA'I SKU NI RDZOGS PA DANG / /

column3: rnam grol chos kyi sku dag ni // / +rnam gnyis rnam gcig shes bya ste // /

column3: zag pa med phyir khyab pa'i phyir // / +'dus ma byas phyir gnas nyid phyir // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2180189#2180198#TD4025E.TXT.r_2205;TD4025E.TXT.r_2206;TD4025E.TXT.r_2207;TD4025E.TXT.r_2208# rnam gnyis  rnam gcig shes bya ste / / +zag PA MED PHYIR KHYAB PA'I PHYIR // /

column3: nyon mongs rnams ni bag chags dang / / +bcas pa 'gags phyir zag med de // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2180197#2180218#TD4025E.TXT.r_2206;TD4025E.TXT.r_2207;TD4025E.TXT.r_2208;TD4025E.TXT.r_2209;TD4025E.TXT.r_2210;TD4025E.TXT.r_2211;TD4025E.TXT.r_2212;TD4025E.TXT.r_2213# zag pa med phyir khyab pa'i phyir // / +'dus ma byas pa'i gnas nyid phyir // / +nyon MONGS RNAMS NI BAG CHAGS DANG / /

column3: chags med thogs pa med pa'i phyir // / +ye shes  khyab pa nyid du 'dod // /
gtan du 'jig pa med pa yi // / +rang bzhin yin phyir 'dus ma byas // / +'jig med nyid ni bstan pa ste // /
brtan sogs rnams kyis de bshad do // / +'jig pa rnam bzhir shes bya ste // / +brtan sogs dag las bzlog phyir ro // /
myags dang    rnam 'gyur chad pa dang / / +bsam mi khyab 'gyur 'pho ba ste // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2180237#2180239#TD4025E.TXT.r_2217;TD4025E.TXT.r_2218# bstan sogs dag las bzlog phyir ro // / +myags DANG RNAM 'GYUR CHAD PA DANG / /

column3: de med phyir na brtan zhi dang / / +rtag dang 'pho med shes par bya // /

column3: dri med shes de dkar po yi // / +chos kyi rten yin phyir na gnas // /

column3: ji ltar rgyu min nam mkha' ni // / +gzugs mthong ba dang sgra dang dri // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2180261#2180269#TD4025E.TXT.r_2223;TD4025E.TXT.r_2224;TD4025E.TXT.r_2225;TD4025E.TXT.r_2226# chos kyi rten yin phyir na gnas // / +ji LTAR RGYU MIN NAM MKHA' NI // /

column3: ro dang  reg dang chos rnams ni // / +thos la sogs pa'i rgyu yin ltar // / +de bzhin sku gnyis sgrib med pa'i // /

column3: sbyor bas bstan pa'i dbang don la // / +zag pa med pa'i yon tan dag / / +skye ba yi ni rgyu yin no // /
bsam med rtag brtan zhi ba gyung drung nyid // / +rab tu zhi khyab rtog  bral nam mkha' bzhin // /

column3: chags med kun tu thogs med rtsub reg spangs // /

column3: lta gzung med dge sangs rgyas dri ma med // / +rnam grol chos kyi sku dag gis // /
rang dang gzhan gyi don bstan te // / +rang gzhan don rten de la ni // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2180364#2180372#TD4025E.TXT.r_2243;TD4025E.TXT.r_2244;TD4025E.TXT.r_2245;TD4025E.TXT.r_2246# rnam grol chos kyi sku dag gis // / +rang DANG GZHAN GYI DON BSTAN TE // /

column3: bsam mi khyab sogs yon tan ldan / / +thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yul // /

column3: sangs rgyas shes gsum yul min phyir // / +ye shes lus can rnams kyis ni // /

column3: bsam mi khyab par rtogs par bya // / +phra phyir thos pa'i yul min te // /

column3: bsgom pa la sogs yul ma yin // / +gang phyir gzugs la dmus long bzhin // /

column3: byis pas de sngon mthong ma myong // / +btsas pa'i khyim nas bu chung gis // /

column3: nyi ma'i gzugs bzhin 'phags pas kyang // / +skye dang bral phyir rtag pa ste // /
'gag med phyir na brtan pa yin // / +gnyis med phyir de zhi ba ste // /

column3: gyung drung chos nyid gnas phyir ro // / +rag zhi 'gog pa'i bden pa'i phyir // /
thams cad rtogs phyir khyab pa nyid // / +gnas pa med phyir rtog med de // /
column4: 0.0#TD4025E.TXT.r#2180451#2180465#TD4025E.TXT.r_2264;TD4025E.TXT.r_2265;TD4025E.TXT.r_2266;TD4025E.TXT.r_2267;TD4025E.TXT.r_2268# rab zhi 'gog pa'i bden pa'i phyir // / +thams CAD RTOGS PHYIR KHYAB PA  nyid // /

column3: nyon mongs spangs phyir chags pa med // / +shes bya'i sgrib kun dag pa'i phyir // /
thams  cad du ni thogs pa med // / +gnyis med las su rung ba'i phyir // /

column3: mtshan ma med phyir gzung du med // / +dge ba rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir // /
dri med dri ma spangs phyir ro // / +thog ma dbus mtha'     // /
column4: 1.192#TD4025E.TXT.r#2180495#2180497#TD4025E.TXT.r_2275;TD4025E.TXT.r_2276# dge ba'i rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir // / +dri MED DRI MA SPANGS PHYIR RO // /

column3: med cing rnam dbyer med // / +gnyis med gsum bral dri med rnam rtog med // /

column3: chos dbyings rang bzhin gang yin da  rtogs pa // / +mnyam par bzhag pa'i rnal 'byor pa yis mthong // /

column3: gzhal med gang ga'i bye ma las 'das pa // / +bsam med mnyam  med yon tan rnams dang ldan // /

column3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri med dbyings de ni // / +bag chags bcas pa'i nyes pa rnam spangs pa'o // /
sna tshogs dam chos 'od zer mnga' ba'i skus // / +'gro ba'i rnam grol don grub la brtson pa // /

column3: mdzad pa yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal bzhin  te ; / / +sna tshogs dngos kyang de yi rang bzhin min // /

column3: 'jig rten zhi ba'i lam la 'jug pa dang / / +rab tu smin dang lung ston rgyu yi gzugs // /

column3: gang yin de yang 'dir ni rtag gnas te // / +nam mkha'i khams su gzugs kyi khams bzhin no // /
rang byung rnams kyi  thams cad mkhyen // / +sangs rgyas nyid ces gang brjod pa // / +mchog tu mya ngan 'das bsam med // /

column3: dgra bcom so so'i bdag gyur pa // / +de dbye zab dang rgya che dang / /

column3: bdag nyid chen po'i yon tan gyi // / +chos kyis rab phye rang bzhin la // /

mdor na yon tan lnga dang ni // / +ldan pa nying du rig par bya // / +'dus ma byas shing rnam dbyer med // /

column3: sgrib gsum  las ni nges grol te // / +dri med rnam par rtog med dang / /

column3: rnal 'byor rnams kyi yul yin phyir // / +chos dbyings ngo bo nyid kyis ni // / +dag pa'i phyir na 'od gsal ba // /

column3: gzhal med grangs med bsam med pa // / +mnyam med dag pa'i mthar thug pa'i // /
yon tan rnams dang yang  dag par // / +ngo bo nyid kyi sku ldan te / / +rgya che'i phyir dang grangs med phyir // /

column3: rtog ge'i yul ni min phyir dang / / +'ba' zhig bag chags bcas spang phyir // /

column3: gzhal med la sogs go rims bzhin // / +sna tshogs chos la rdzogs longs spyod // /

column3: rang bzhin chos ni snang phyir    dang / / +thugs rje dag pa'i rgyu mthun pa // /

column3: mngon par 'du byed med pa dang / / +de yi ngo bo min ston la // / +'dir ni sna tshogs rnam lngar ston // /

column3: ji ltar tshon ni sna tshogs kyis // / +nor bu de dngos min snang ltar // /
